basic.description: This course covers the theory of Hierarchical State Machines [HSM] and the use of HSM to model and implement Reactive Systems [RS]. The course explores implementations of HSM in C, C++, and Java. HSM are applied for modeling and implementing RS including real-time, multi-threaded, and embedded systems.
basic.subject: COP
basic.title: Reactive Systems Programming

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: COP 4530. Corequisite: COP 4610 or instructor permission.
